author: andersonchen
content: Sure I can join the lighthouse discord. I wrote C++, python, Javascript and Solidity. I know Lighthouse is Rust and I'm also interesting in learning Rust!

author: 721orbit
content: Hey guys nice to meet you all. Ill be pursuing the fellowship in a permissionless manner and wanted to ask that before selecting and starting on the project we should first focus on this reading list(https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/program-guide/reading.md)  to get familiarized and then start diving in a particular project right?
